.. jigglypuff:

Jigglypuff
-----------

.. image:: ../../_images/pokemobs/gen_1/entity_icon/textures/jigglypuff.png
    :alt: Jigglypuff
.. image:: ../../_images/pokemobs/gen_1/entity_icon/textures/jigglypuffs.png
    :alt: Jigglypuff


| Jigglypuff is a normal/fairy Pok√©mob.
| Jigglypuff evolves into :doc:`wigglytuff`:
|  -  When given a Moon Stone.
| 
| Jigglypuff evolves from :doc:`igglybuff`.
